properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 2:38PM CST until February 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Light snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total
snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as
40 mph.

* WHERE...Buffalo County.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold
wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY
